column1: gives a wider meaning than the word “expense”. “Outgoings” incurred by a
person  carrying  out  a  profession,  could  include  a  wide  variety  of  items,
which would not come within the meaning of “expenses”. Basnayake, C.J.
in  Hayley and  Company  Ltd  v.  Commissioner of Inland  Revenue (supra),
considered the two phrases referred to above which formed section 9 (1) of
the former Income Tax Ordinance. Section 9 (1) is similar to section 23 (1)
